requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Supported OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP
  • Processor: Pentium® IV/AMD Athlon™ Single Core (3GHz)
  • Memory: 1 GB
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7600GT/ATI Radeon™ 2900 with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • Hard Drive: 4 GB of free space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card

  • Supported OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Windows Vista®/Windows 7®
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo/AMD Athlon x2(1.86Ghz)
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/ATI Radeon 3600 with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • Input: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller for Windows

The game's performance and/or graphical quality may differ according to your computer's hardware and/or video card. Computers with high-performance hardware will provide the best game performance.
